description: Execute a set of defined states for each element of the data input array

inputCollection.description: JSONPath expression selecting an JSON array element of the states data input

outputCollection.description: JSONPath expression specifying where in the states data output to place the final data output of each iteration of the executed states

inputParameter.description: JSONPath expression specifying an JSON object field of the states data input. For each parallel iteration, this field will get populated with a unique element of the inputCollection array

max.description: Specifies how upper bound on how many iterations may run in parallel

timeDelay.description: Amount of time (ISO 8601 format) to wait between each iteration

states.description: States to be executed for each of the elements of inputCollection
